description: Try our easy to follow Mediterranean Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Salad,Pescatarian,Halal,Seafood free,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Egg free,Summer,Peanut free
name: Mediterranean Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 bunch flat leaf parsley, finely chopped
3 tbs lemon juice (save 1 tbs for later)

recipeInstructions.text: Place barley in a saucepan with 2 1/2 cups water. Bring to boil. Simmer, partly covered, for 20 minutes until tender. Drain, refresh with cold water and leave to drain well.
Combine parsley, spring onion and garlic in a large bowl. Add pearl barley, olive oil and lemon juice. Season with salt and pepper. Stir well to combine.
Heat extra oil in a saucepan over medium heat. Add coriander and cumin and cook for 1 minute. Add chickpeas and stir for 5 minutes or until lightly toasted. Remove from heat. Sprinkle over sumac.
Stir lemon juice into hummus. Spoon hummus mixture into the base of a 2Lcapacity jar. Follow with a layer each of spiced chickpea, capsicum, barley mixture and feta. Seal.
